description: Battery Cycler 23240-240196 Christopher Casale Telephone No.:  343-575-5249 Christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide a Battery Cycler to conduct drive cycle (charge / discharge) testing on EV battery modules / pack to Natural Resources Canada.
full_summary:
================================

### Tender Announcement: Battery Cycler

#### Solicitation Number: WS4138567676
#### Publication Date: 2023-09-21

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) invites offers from qualified vendors to provide a *Battery Cycler* to support the testing and evaluation of Electric Vehicle (EV) battery modules and packs. The battery cycler must be capable of conducting drive cycle (charge/discharge) testing.

#### Tender Details:

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Upon award, negotiations, and contract signature
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Ongoing, dependent on project requirements
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Customer Information:
The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) requires a battery cycler to support the testing and evaluation of EV battery modules and packs.

#### Vendor Information:

Request for Proposal packages, including specifications and instructions to bidders, can be found on Ariba Discovery (link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17515685?extsite=MTc1MTU2ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

All offers must be submitted electronically by 14:00 EDT on October 24th, 2023.

## End of Tender Announcement
=====================================
